markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 38 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 33 [Gambulami](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1701) **Source** [Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple City](/Sources.aspx?ID=102) pg. 37 **Perception** +21; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +24, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +18, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +20, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +22, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +21, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +22, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +21 **Str** +7 **Dex** +5 **Con** +3 **Int** +1 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +3 **Items** [_deflecting branch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1448), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10) (3) --- **AC** 31 **Fort** +24 **Ref** +20 **Will** +21 **HP** 200 **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** --- **Speed** 20 feet **Melee** _deflecting branch_ +24 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)), **Damage** 3d10+13 bludgeoning **Melee** jaws +22, **Damage** 2d8+13 piercing plus Grab **Ranged** spear +22 ([thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 1d6+13 piercing **Primal Innate Spells** DC 30 - **1st** [Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34) **Inspired Feast** ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Human](/Traits.aspx?ID=90)) If a biloko feasts on a [human](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=6) corpse for 1 minute or more, they gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls for 1 hour. **Size Alteration** ([Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) Gambulami is affected by a 4th-level [_enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=102) spell. This lasts for 1 minute, and Gambulami can Dismiss the Spell. **Thrashing Chomp** **Requirements** Gambulami is larger than Small in size and has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) with his jaws; **Effect** Gambulami whips the creature around, smashing it against other nearby creatures. He makes an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check against the grabbed creature's Fortitude DC. Regardless of the result, the creature is released from Gambulami's jaws afterward, escaping into the space in which it was grabbed.
**Critical Success** Gambulami uses a mighty spin to smash the held creature against every creature within his reach. Every creature, including the grabbed creature, takes 1d10+7 bludgeoning damage.
**Success** As critical success, but creatures take 1d10 bludgeoning damage.
**Failure** The creature breaks free.
**Critical Failure** The creature breaks free and Gambulami's spin causes him to fall [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).
name: Gambulami

text: Gambulami Recall Knowledge - Fey (Nature): DC 38 Unspecific Lore : DC 36 Specific Lore : DC 33 Gambulami Source Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple City pg. 37 Perception +21; low-light vision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet Languages Aklo, Common, Sylvan Skills Athletics +24, Crafting +18, Deception +20, Intimidation +22, Nature +21, Stealth +22, Survival +21 Str +7 Dex +5 Con +3 Int +1 Wis +4 Cha +3 Items deflecting branch , Leather Armor, Spear (3) --- AC 31 Fort +24 Ref +20 Will +21 HP 200 Attack of Opportunity Reaction --- Speed 20 feet Melee Single Action deflecting branch +24 (Forceful, Magical, Sweep), Damage 3d10+13 bludgeoning Melee Single Action jaws +22, Damage 2d8+13 piercing plus Grab Ranged Single Action spear +22 (thrown 20 feet), Damage 1d6+13 piercing Primal Innate Spells DC 30 - 1st Charm Inspired Feast (Emotion, Human) If a biloko feasts on a human corpse for 1 minute or more, they gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls for 1 hour. Size Alteration Two Actions (Polymorph, Primal, Transmutation) Gambulami is affected by a 4th-level enlarge spell. This lasts for 1 minute, and Gambulami can Dismiss the Spell. Thrashing Chomp Two Actions Requirements Gambulami is larger than Small in size and has a creature grabbed with his jaws; Effect Gambulami whips the creature around, smashing it against other nearby creatures. He makes an Athletics check against the grabbed creature's Fortitude DC. Regardless of the result, the creature is released from Gambulami's jaws afterward, escaping into the space in which it was grabbed. Critical Success Gambulami uses a mighty spin to smash the held creature against every creature within his reach. Every creature, including the grabbed creature, takes 1d10+7 bludgeoning damage. Success As critical success, but creatures take 1d10 bludgeoning damage. Failure The creature breaks free. Critical Failure The creature breaks free and Gambulami's spin causes him to fall prone.
